attributes.additional_details:
Stop B.T. from putting a meter on your broadband internet and charging you more than what your electricity bill normally comes to.

B.T. do not own the Superhighway that travels around the world - all governments contribute to the cost of it.

A standard fee for just  a connection to the internet should be the norm.

If the whole country is going to be a 'wired nation' with internet broadband always on, it would cost an awful big bill at the end of every month for users.

Vote for an end to metering the internet, it should be unfettered.
